channel.title: [PI] Log-out Project-Exile?
channel.description: Hey everyone, I've been editing my server for a while now, and now just finishing off the last few bits before going online.. However, I noticed one thing, when I click the logout button, it says "When you have finished playing Project-Exile, always use the button below to log out safely" I have searched for ages looking where this is and am still un-able to find it, and I think it's hidden. Is there a way to change it? Thanks in advance.

item.title: [PI] Log-out Project-Exile?
item.dc:creator: @Dario14 Dario14
item.description:
@Dario14 wrote:

I don’t know the whole deal on why its not found, i think its a picture and not text. But anyways to change the name, search for the word “Runescape” on your client and next to it should say Project-Exile, change that to your servers name. I hope that helps you

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Log-out Project-Exile?
item.dc:creator: @KFC KFC
item.description:
@KFC wrote:

Hey everyone, I’ve been editing my server for a while now, and now just finishing off the last few bits before going online…
However, I noticed one thing, when I click the logout button, it says
“When you have finished playing Project-Exile, always use the button below to log out safely”
I have searched for ages looking where this is and am still un-able to find it, and I think it’s hidden.
Is there a way to change it? Thanks in advance.

Read full topic
